data.prayer: the county of Jhunjhunun has (about) 23,507 people who know Jesus, 25,929 people who know about him culturally, and 2,087,564 people who are far from Jesus.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Jhunjhunun, Rajasthan, India

data.prayer: Jesus, remind the disciples in the county of Jhunjhunun to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the church in the county of Jhunjhunun to increase their prayer for your kingdom to come.
data.verse: Now when Daniel learned that the decree had been published, he went home to his upstairs room where the windows opened toward Jerusalem. Three times a day he got down on his knees and prayed, giving thanks to his God...

data.prayer: Jesus, protect the vulnerable in Jhunjhunun, Rajasthan, India from the evil one.
data.verse: My prayer is not that you take them out of the world but that you protect them from the evil one.

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the Rajput Kachhwaha people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Father, grace the churches in Jhunjhunun, Rajasthan, India with faithful local leaders.
data.verse: Where there is no guidance, a people falls, but in an abundance of counselors there is safety.

data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to a faithful non-believer today, someone like Cornelius, and then Father please connect him with the church in Jhunjhunun, Rajasthan, India.
data.verse: Cornelius answered: “Three days ago I was in my house praying at this hour, at three in the afternoon. Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor."

data.section_summary:
the county of Jhunjhunun, Rajasthan, India has a population of 2,137,000.

We estimate Jhunjhunun has 23,507 people who might know Jesus, 25,929 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 2,087,564 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to Jhunjhunun, Rajasthan, India.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.
